    • Method Detail

      • inviteFriends

        public abstract void inviteFriends(Context context,
                 java.lang.String subject,
                 java.lang.String text,
                 java.lang.String referralDataUrl,
                 Bitmap image,
                 InvitePlugin.InviteFriendsObserver callback)
        When this method is called, the plugin can assume: - the game is authenticated - no other invite plugin is active. The plugin MUST NOT assume: - handlers listing for the state change from unidentified to verifying have completed. inviteFriends MUST guarantee that exactly one of the callbacks is eventually called. (i.e. either completeCallback or cancelCallback)
